id.description: A unique identifier for the Recipe

filter_expression.description: JEXL expression defined in an Audience

targeting.description: JEXL expression using messaging system environment

ExperimentRecipe.description:
The experiment definition accessible to Firefox via Remote Settings.
It is compatible with ExperimentManager.

userFacingDescription.description: Short public description of the experiment

active.description: Is the experiment currently live in production? i.e., published to remote settings?

isEnrollmentPaused.description: Are we continuing to enroll new users into the experiment?

randomizationUnit.description: The randomization unit. Note that client_id is not yet implemented.

namespace.description: Additional inputs to the hashing function

start.description: Index of start of the range of buckets

features.description: A list of features relevant to the experiment analysis

ratio.description:
Relative ratio of population for the branch (e.g. if branch A=1 and branch B=3,
branch A would get 25% of the population)

group.description: Used to indicate a type of branch value

value.description: The variant payload. TODO: This will be more strictly validated.

startDate.description: Actual publish date of the experiment

endDate.description: Actual end date of the experiment

proposedEnrollment.description: Duration of enrollment from the start date in days

referenceBranch.description: The slug of the reference branch
